text: multi-view is a financial erp system
traditionally deployed as a Windows
application so when we compared building
rebuilding multi-view as a web app we
saw that the time to market would have
been five years and significant costs in
doing so when we compared it to using
app stream 2.0 we found that there would
be literally solution available to our
customers overnight no costs and we
leveraged the AWS pay-as-you-go model
and so the benefit of app stream is we
can take our existing Windows app with
not having to rewrite or make any coding
changes and deploy it to users over the
internet across through a web browser to
a web browser and sell it as a SAS model
the app stream 2.0 solution allowed us
to be able to deliver a cloud-based
product to our customers immediately
